<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a Permission Group by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/authz/v1/permission_group/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes an existing permission group based on the permissionGroupId
